title: AcknowledgeAllOfGroupWithComment (Method)
text:
METHOD AcknowledgeAllOfGroupWithComment
Acknowledges all active alarms of an alarm group, whose alarm class hasnât the flag
âacknowledge separatelyâ set. Optionally a comment and the user id can be provided.

rows.Name: usiAlarmGroupID
rows.Comment: The ID of the alarm group

rows.Name: wsComment
rows.Comment: The comment for the state transition

rows: The user who provides the comment
